elambaena nawa wasarata aashirwada laba ganimin janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha eeye (29) perawaruwe anuradhapura jaya shri maha bodhin wahanse wanda puda gaththeya.me awasthawata janapathi aarya shiranthi rajapaksha mahathmiya saha parlimenthu manthri namal rajapaksha mahathada sahabhagi wuha.jaya shri maha bodhin wahanse wetha siwuru pirikara puja kala janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha athulu pirisata maha sangharathnaya wisin seth pirith sajjhayanaya karamin pirith nul gatagasa aashirwada kalaha.me awasthawata atamasthanadhipathi aacharya pujya pallegama siriniwasa nahimiyan mirisawatiya chaithyaramadhipathi eethalwatunuwawa gnyanathilaka nahimiyan ha lankaramadhipathi ralapanawe dhammajothi yana nahimiwaru sahabhagi wi sitiyaha.jaya shri maha bodhin wahanse wetha paminimata pera janapathithuman athulu pirisa atamasthanadhipathi nahimiyan bahadaka aashirwada labagath athara ehidi ethuman wisin nahimiyan wetha atapirikara puja kaleya.in anathuruwa janapathithuman ruwanwali chaithyaramadhipathi pujya pallegama hemarathana nahimiyan baha daka atapirikara puja karamin ashirwada laba gath athara anathuruwa ruwanwali chaithyarajayanan wata padakunu kara mal pahan puja kaleya.
